titleStmt.title: A true narrative of the tryals of Titus Oats for perjury at the Kings-bench-barr at VVestminster, on Friday and Saturday the 8th and 9th days of this present May, 1685.
A true narrative of the tryals of Titus Oats for perjury at the Kings-bench-barr at VVestminster, on Friday and Saturday the 8th and 9th days of this present May, 1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Mallet in Black-Horse-Alley neer Fleet-Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Incorrectly identified as Wing (2nd ed.) T2840AC on film and in reel guide.
Also published in the same year with title: True narrative of the tryal of Titus Oats for perjury at the Kings-bench-barr at VVestminster (Wing CD-ROM, 1996 T2840AC).
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
